CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Call_Status_Config__c, 'Contacted'), Selisih__c != null, OR(ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - Agree to Cancel Withdrawal'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - With Reduction Withdrawal Amount'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Agree - Others') ) ), Selisih__c , 0)
CustomField.label: Amount Retain Redemption
